title: Elon Musk Proposes Selling 10% of Tesla Stock
itunes:title: Elon Musk Proposes Selling 10% of Tesla Stock
description:
Dr. David Kim, Chief Executive of Physician Enterprise at Providence Health System, discusses seeing a decrease in Covid cases around the U.S. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Vancouver Bureau Chief Natalie Obiko Pearson share Natalie's Businessweek Magazine story Rogers Family Feud Ends for Now, But Sit Tight for the Sequel. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull talks about Tesla slumping as Twitter users back Elon Musk selling 10% of his stake. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Kat Chiglinsky explains why Warren Buffett is signaling caution with Berkshire on a stock-selling streak. And We Drive to the Close with Dan Genter, CEO of RNC Genter Capital Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
